message.bodyText: You float into the cosmic bubble. The stellar winds whip around you as you witness the birth of new stars. In the distance, you see a mysterious spacecraft and a swirling temporal vortex.
You're surrounded by floating cryptocurrencies and NFTs. Everything seems valuable, but somehow unreal. You notice a suspicious trading bot and a door marked 'Market Crash'.

soap_bubble.bodyText: Inside the soap bubble, everything is distorted by rainbow refractions. You see a tiny civilization living on the surface tension, and a mysterious bubble-blowing wand.

message.bodyText: You seem to have wandered into an unknown bubble. The surroundings are mysterious and unfamiliar.
